tweet: Last week I introduced the Veterans’ Credit Protection Act of 2019 to help vets avoid damage to their credit histories due to late payments by the VA. Read this @jocoreport article for more info on how this bill will help our veterans ➡️ https://bit.ly/3148FGy

On this #MemorialDay, our nation pays tribute to all the brave men and women who made the ultimate sacrifice for the freedom and liberty of our country.  May we all come together to pause and remember these heroes today and every day. #NC07 pic.twitter.com/mN08BhKV1g
Passage of this bill would help reduce the backlog of payments at the @DeptVetAffairs and help veterans resolve credit issues when they occur. Read more here ➡️  https://bit.ly/2weTNGX

This week, I introduced the Veterans’ Credit Protection Act of 2019, which seeks to address the VA’s long history of delayed payments to outside service providers & help veterans prevent & resolve credit issues resulting from delayed payment by the @DeptVetAffairs.

There are many veterans across our country & #NC07 who have had their credit destroyed through no fault of their own because the @DeptVetAffairs paid their medical bills late, or not at all. No veteran should take a hit to their credit because of a delayed payment by the VA.
